mapper.select: SELECT an.`anonymId`, an.`password`, an.`quickPassword`, an.`nickName`, an.`userName`, an.`headerImg`, an.`phone`, an.`deviceId`, an.`createTime` FROM an_anonym an WHERE an.`anonymId`=#{anonymId}
SELECT an.`anonymId`, an.`nickName`, an.`userName`, an.`headerImg`, an.`phone`, an.`deviceId`, an.`createTime` FROM an_anonym an WHERE an.phone=#{phone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO an_anonym ( anonymId, nickName, userName, quickPassword, headerImg, phone, deviceId, createTime, updateTime ) VALUES ( #{anonymId}, #{nickName}, #{userName}, #{quickPassword}, #{headerImg}, #{phone}, #{deviceId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE an_anonym an SET an.`nickName` = #{nickName}, an.`userName` = #{userName}, an.`quickPassword` = #{quickPassword}, an.`headerImg` = #{headerImg}, an.`phone` = #{phone}, an.`isLock` = #{isLock}, an.`deviceId` = #{deviceId}, an.`lockReason` = #{lockReason}, an.`delFlag` = #{delFlag}, an.`createTime` = #{createTime}, an.`updateTime` = #{updateTime} WHERE an.`anonymId` = #{anonymId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.`anonymId`, a.`backgroundImg`, a.`city`, a.`deviceId`, a.`headerImg`, a.`nickName`, a.`personalSignature`, a.`phone`, a.`sex`, a.`userName` FROM an_anonym a WHERE a.`anonymId`=#{anonymId};
